answers.author: Louise Snyder
answers.text:
Hi Bond-I see you requested feedback by yesterday. If it's still helpful, my recommendation would be to simply conduct a google search with the key words 'California county scorecard'. You should be able to develop a pretty good estimate and gather samples for review. You might also try the California State Association of Counties at http://www.counties.org

author: E Bond Francisco
text: I'm looking for a source of information for statistics that might reveal a percentage, numbers, etc. of local county governments, particularly California, but nationwide as well. I'm new to this game, so if anyone can point me to a resource, I'd really appreciate it. Thanks, ~Bond
title: Balanced Scorecard/MFR statistics
